section.p: Supported export formats are CSV (comma separated values), TXT (plain text), and HTML (see ). Profile images are exported along with other profile data when exporting student profiles into HTML. The images will be stored in a folder located in the same directory as the export file and having the same name with addition of _files suffix.

All Export operation are performed from the corresponding context menus (see ). A save as window will appear, where you can specify:
export format;
path;
filename.
Export parameters
Export parameters
If the filename is missing extension, it will be added automatically depending on the export format.
